# GitHub Copilot Instructions for InTellMe Website

## Project Overview
This is a premium, professional tech portfolio website for InTellMe showcasing the company and its ventures. The design emphasizes sophistication, elegance, and a high-end hotel aesthetic (Hilton-quality).

## Code Style and Standards

### Visual Elements
- **NO EMOJIS**: Never use emojis in any part of the codebase unless explicitly requested by the user
- Use professional text formatting instead: bullets (•, ◦), line numbers, dashes, etc.
- Maintain a classy, premium, professional appearance suitable for an educated, sophisticated audience
- Avoid cartoonish or childish design elements

### Design Philosophy
- Premium dark theme with sophisticated color palette
- Primary background: #08071c (dark indigo blue)
- Primary text: #ffffff (white)
- Accent/headings: #db0d0d (orange-red)
- Typography: Elegant serif fonts (Georgia, Times New Roman) for headings
- Clean sans-serif fonts (Helvetica Neue, Arial) for body text and navigation
- Maintain generous spacing and professional layout

### Technical Standards
- Pure HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript (no external frameworks)
- Responsive design optimized for all devices
- Semantic HTML5 elements
- Accessible design following WCAG guidelines
- Clean, well-commented code
- Performance-optimized assets

### Content Guidelines
- Professional, sophisticated tone
- Clear, concise descriptions
- Focus on business value and innovation
- Avoid casual or playful language unless specifically requested

## Venture Cards
When adding or modifying venture cards:
- Use professional icons or text-based indicators (no emojis)
- Consistent card structure and styling
- Clear call-to-action buttons
- Proper external link handling (target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer")

## Testing and Validation
- Validate HTML and CSS
- Test on multiple browsers and devices
- Ensure all links are functional
- Verify responsive design breakpoints

## Maintenance Notes
- Keep dependencies minimal
- Document any new features or changes
- Maintain consistent code formatting
- Update README when adding new functionality
